products.name: Apple Watch Series 9
products.description: The Apple Watch Series 9, featuring the powerful S9 SiP chip for a brighter display and magical new ways to interact without touching the screen. Advanced health, safety, and activity features provide helpful insights and assistance when you need it.

specifications.display: 45mm Always-On Retina LTPO OLED display, up to 2000 nits
specifications.sensors: Blood Oxygen sensor, Electrical heart sensor (ECG app), Temperature sensing

products.name: iPhone 16
products.description: The iPhone 16, powered by the A18 chip and built for Apple Intelligence. It features an advanced dual-camera system, the intuitive Action button, and a durable design with Ceramic Shield front.

specifications.camera: Advanced dual-camera system: 48MP Main, 12MP Ultra Wide

products.name: iPhone Cases
products.description: Designed by Apple to complement your iPhone, these cases offer a delightful way to protect your device. The silky, soft-touch finish feels great in your hand, and a soft microfiber lining provides even more protection. Built-in magnets ensure a magical attach experience and faster wireless charging.

specifications.compatibility: iPhone 14, 14 Plus, 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max, 15, 15 Plus

products.name: iTel A70
products.description: The Itel A70 is a budget-friendly smartphone that offers generous storage and a large display. It features a Dynamic Bar for notifications, a long-lasting battery, and expandable memory, making it a great value for everyday use.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy A06
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy A06 offers an immersive 6.7-inch display, a high-resolution 50MP camera for capturing detailed photos, and a large 5,000mAh battery to power you through the day. It provides a smooth experience for all your essential tasks.
features: Up to 2 major Android OS upgrades

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
products.description: Experience the epic standard with the Galaxy S24 Ultra. Encased in a durable titanium frame, it features a stunning 6.8-inch flat display, a built-in S Pen to revolutionize how you create, and a pro-grade 200MP camera with unparalleled zoom capabilities, all powered by Galaxy AI.

specifications.durability: Titanium frame, IP68 Water & Dust Resistance

features: Galaxy AI features including Circle to Search and Live Translate

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge
products.description: The Galaxy S25 Edge combines flagship power with an incredibly slim and light design. It features a stunning edge-to-edge QHD+ display, a powerful 200MP main camera, and the next-generation Snapdragon processor, all enhanced with advanced Galaxy AI tools.

specifications.durability: Titanium frame, IP68 Water & Dust Resistance

features: 7 years of promised software and security updates

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
products.description: The pinnacle of mobile technology, the Galaxy S25 Ultra features a massive 6.9-inch display, the most powerful Snapdragon Elite processor, and an advanced quad-camera system with a 200MP main sensor. It's the ultimate tool for productivity and creativity, complete with an enhanced S Pen and next-gen Galaxy AI.

specifications.spen: Enhanced S Pen with AI features
specifications.durability: Titanium frame, IP68 Water & Dust Resistance

features: 7 years of OS upgrades and security updates

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6
products.description: Unfold a world of possibilities with the Galaxy Z Fold6. Thinner, lighter, and more durable, it features a massive 7.6-inch main display for PC-like productivity and an immersive cinematic experience. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and enhanced with Galaxy AI, it's the ultimate multitasking machine.
features: Thinner, lighter, and more durable design

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7
products.description: Express yourself with the Galaxy Z Flip7. Featuring a larger 4.1-inch cover screen for more functionality when closed, this compact foldable fits perfectly in your pocket. It boasts a powerful new processor, a versatile 50MP camera, and a durable design for peace of mind.
features: FlexCam for hands-free photos and videos

products.name: Samsung SmartTag2
products.description: Keep track of your valuables with the Galaxy SmartTag2. With an enhanced battery life of up to 500 days, an IP67 dust and water resistance rating, and intuitive finding features like Compass View, the SmartTag2 helps you locate your items with ease.

specifications.compatibility: Galaxy devices with Android OS 9 or higher

features: Compass View for intuitive direction finding
Works with Samsung SmartThings Find network

products.name: Samsung 15W Adapter
products.description: Give your devices the powerful charging support they deserve with the official Samsung 15W Power Adapter. Enjoy 15W Fast Charging for a wide range of tech essentials with any USB-C enabled device.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9
products.description: Meet the Galaxy Tab A9. Its sleek design and smooth metal body make it easy to handle, while the large, bright display offers an immersive experience for movies and games. Enjoy rich audio with dual speakers and store more of what you love with expandable storage.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+
products.description: Level up your entertainment with the Galaxy Tab A9+. A large 11-inch screen with a smooth 90Hz refresh rate makes everything look and feel amazing. Powered by a Snapdragon processor and featuring Quad Speakers, it’s perfect for gaming, streaming, and multitasking.
features: Immersive Quad Speakers with Dolby Atmos
Samsung DeX for a PC-like experience
Up to 3 apps on one screen with split-screen

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ Cellular
products.description: Stay connected everywhere with the Galaxy Tab A9+ Cellular. A large 11-inch screen with a smooth 90Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon processor, and 8GB of RAM for enhanced multitasking. Perfect for work, play, and staying in touch on the go.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE
products.description: Unleash your creativity and productivity with the Galaxy Tab S10 FE. It comes with the versatile S Pen, a powerful Exynos processor, and a large, vibrant display. With 5G connectivity and an all-day battery, it’s designed for work and play anywhere.
features: S Pen included for notes and drawing

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10+ FE
products.description: Experience more with the Galaxy Tab S10+ FE. A larger premium tablet with enhanced features, a powerful processor for smooth performance, and the creative versatility of the included S Pen. Perfect for professionals and creators on the move.
features: Samsung DeX for a desktop experience

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch7
products.description: Meet the Galaxy Watch7, powered by a new 3nm processor for supercharged performance. It features an upgraded BioActive Sensor for next-level health tracking precision, dual-frequency GPS for accurate navigation, and new Galaxy AI features to help you understand your body better.

specifications.connectivity: LTE, Bluetooth 5.3, Wi-Fi, NFC, Dual-Frequency GPS
specifications.sensors: Upgraded BioActive Sensor (Heart Rate, SpO2, Temp), ECG

features: Advanced BioActive Sensor for precise health tracking
Galaxy AI-powered wellness insights like Energy Score
Dual-Frequency GPS for accurate location tracking

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch8
products.description: The slimmest Galaxy Watch yet. The Galaxy Watch8 combines an elegant, streamlined profile with powerful performance from its 3nm processor. It features a brilliantly bright 3,000-nit display and introduces groundbreaking AI-driven wellness features like Antioxidant Index and Bedtime Guidance.

specifications.connectivity: LTE, Bluetooth 5.3, Wi-Fi, NFC, Dual-Frequency GPS

Personalized Running Coach and Energy Score

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra
products.description: Built for adventurers, the Galaxy Watch Ultra is engineered to thrive in the most challenging environments. It features a rugged titanium case, a brilliant 3,000-nit display, and a battery that lasts up to 100 hours. With dual-frequency GPS and advanced AI-powered health insights, it's the ultimate tool for exploration.

features: Up to 100 hours of battery life
Super bright 3,000-nit display for outdoor visibility

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch Fit3
products.description: Your ultimate fitness partner, the Galaxy Fit3 features a large AMOLED display to view your workout data at a glance. It's slim, light, and comfortable, with a battery that lasts up to 13 days. Track over 100 exercises and monitor your health around the clock.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro3
